text: Sphingomonas roseiflava is a bacterium from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from the plant Setaria viridis in the Ibaraki Prefecture in Japan.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas roseiflava at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase roseiflava Category:Bacteria described in 2000
title: Sphingomonas roseiflava
